metadata.title: CVE-2022-1515 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory leak was discovered in matio 1.5.21 and earlier inMat_VarReadNextInfo5() in mat5.c via a crafted file. This issue canpotentially result in DoS.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-1515` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmatio9 - 1.5.17-3ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libmatio package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5.17-3ubuntu0.1~esm2').
